Class FollowedSeriesResource

public class FollowedSeriesResource
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • createFollowedSeries

        @PostMapping(value="/followed-series")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FollowedSeries> createFollowedSeries(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                     @Valid FollowedSeries followedSeries)
                                                                                                                              throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        POST /followed-series : Create a new followedSeries.
        Parameters:
        followedSeries - the followedSeries to create
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new followedSeries, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the followedSeries has already an ID
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect

      • updateFollowedSeries

        @PutMapping(value="/followed-series")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FollowedSeries> updateFollowedSeries(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                    @Valid FollowedSeries followedSeries)
        PUT /followed-series : Updates an existing followedSeries.
        Parameters:
        followedSeries - the followedSeries to update
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated followedSeries, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the followedSeries is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the followedSeries couldn't be updated

      • getAllFollowedSeries

        @GetMapping(value="/followed-series")
 @Timed
public java.util.List<FollowedSeries> getAllFollowedSeries()
        GET /followed-series : get all the followedSeries.
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of followedSeries in body

        @GetMapping(value="/followed-series/{id}")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FollowedSeries> getFollowedSeries(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Long id)
        GET /followed-series/:id : get the followedSeries by "id".
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the followedSeries to retrieve
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the followedSeries, or with status 404 (Not Found)

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the series to retrieve
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the series, or with status 404 (Not Found)
